Posts.Content: Hello to all I never thought that one day I will be searching and posting on The Cancer Forum. But here I am. In 1 day my life changed. For 2 weeks ago I had a mammography and 3 hrs. later I was sent to another hospital for biopsies. What a pain and they already have told me I have breast cancer. I am scared, sad, cannot sleep and stil hopeing its only a nighmare and nothing real. But no. The countdown to surgery is start it. I have been told that surgery will last 4 hrs and there is unknown if I wake up with some breast or nothing. I need youe help to fight it. I am so scared. Wish you all long life and away from worries Ahope
Posts.Signature: Adriana 42 y.o Breast cancer Waiting for surgery 2006 May 2th
Posts.Title: New with breast cancer

Posts.Content: Shelly I thank you for your post. It is good to know what to do after surgery. The idea of the notebook is excellent. I did not think at that. I am so scared and sad and empty of logical thinking. All what I do is crying. I will be thinking at you on Monday. You seem so strong to me. Good luck to you and God bless you Adriana
Posts.Signature: Adriana 42 y.o Breast cancer Waiting for surgery 2006 May 2th
Posts.Title: New with breast cancer
